nz.govt.natlib.adapter.xml

Class XMLAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.govt.natlib.adapter.DataAdapter
      • nz.govt.natlib.adapter.xml.XMLAdapter

  • public class XMLAdapter
extends DataAdapter
    An Adapter to extract the information from the XML and DOCTYPE declarations in an XML file.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nic Evans

           throws java.io.IOException
        Extract the XML encoding type, version, adn DOCTYPE from the XML file.
        Specified by:
        adapt in class DataAdapter
        Parameters:

        out - The ParserContext to fire events to.

        java.io.IOException - if there are errors reading the file.

        public java.lang.String getInputType()
        Description copied from class: DataAdapter
        Return the MimeType of the type of file this adapter "adapts". For standard adapters this should return the MIME type of the input file. Subclasses will, in general, hard-code this value.
        Specified by:
